mapper.insert: insert into user (user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_phone, city, street, zipcode, created_at) values (#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{userPhone}, #{city}, #{street}, #{zipcode}, now())
mapper.update: update user set user_pw = #{userPw}, user_name = #{userName}, user_phone = #{userPhone}, city = #{city}, street = #{street}, zipcode = #{zipcode} where user_id = #{userId}
